content: जृंभित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [जृंभ्-क्त] {@--1@} Yawned, gaped. {@--2@} Opened, expanded, displayed; <ls>Māl. 1. 32.</ls> {@--3@} Opened, blown (as a flower). {@--4@} Done, exerted. {@--5@} Enlarged, increased. --तं {@--1@} Gaping. {@--2@} Expansion, opening, blooming. {@--3@} Developing, coming into view.
